sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku adalah seorang musisi yang sangat terkenal.
english translation: "I am a very famous musician."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Lirik lagu ini sangat indah.
english translation: "The lyrics of this song are very beautiful."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami menonton pertunjukan wayang malam ini.
english translation: "We are watching a wayang show tonight."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Film ini disutradarai oleh seorang sutradara terkenal.
english translation: "This film is directed by a famous director."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Film ini dibintangi oleh aktor terkenal.
english translation: "This film is starring a famous actor."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Musik ini memiliki irama yang sangat menarik.
english translation: "This music has a very interesting rhythm."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku percaya kepada Tuhan yang maha kuasa.
english translation: "I believe in God Almighty."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku senang berdoa di pagi hari.
english translation: "I like praying in the morning."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Malaikat itu datang untuk memberikan pertolongan.
english translation: "The angel came to provide assistance."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Awas, setan sedang mencoba menggoda kita.
english translation: "Beware, the devil is trying to tempt us."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku memeluk agama Islam sejak lahir.
english translation: "I have embraced Islam since birth."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Banyak teman saya adalah orang Katolik.
english translation: "Many of my friends are Catholic."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia adalah seorang penganut agama Hindu.
english translation: "He is a follower of Hinduism."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dewa itu dihormati dan disembah oleh banyak orang.
english translation: "The god is respected and worshiped by many people."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dewi itu dikenal sebagai dewi kecantikan.
english translation: "The goddess is known as the goddess of beauty."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya adalah seorang Kristen yang taat.
english translation: "I am a devout Christian."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Buddha adalah pendiri agama Buddha.
english translation: "Buddha is the founder of Buddhism."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Mereka sedang beribadah di gereja sekarang.
english translation: "They are worshiping in the church now."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami mengunjungi wihara yang indah di sana.
english translation: "We visited a beautiful Buddhist temple there."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pastor itu memberikan khotbah yang menginspirasi.
english translation: "The pastor delivered an inspiring sermon."
